description: This file defines a functional component NoteList that renders a list of notes with features for selection and deletion, based on provided parameters. It manipulates DOM elements directly, generating HTML and attaching event listeners.

methods.name: NoteList(mountEl, { notes, activeId, onSelect, onDelete })
methods.description: Renders a list of note items, handling selection and deletion with event listeners.

methods.name: formatDate(iso)
methods.description: Formats ISO date strings into locale strings with error handling.

methods.name: escapeHtml(str)
methods.description: Escapes special HTML characters in strings to prevent injection.
